4.5 starI was pulled right into this story. The story flowed so well I could not tell when the authors switching in the story. The story has laughs and heartbreak.This is Tessa and Max’s story. Max is in prison but up for a parole hearing. Did he commit the crime he is convicted of yes, was he justified in committing the crime, to him yes he was. Tessa works at the same office that Max’s lawyer does.  She will be with him during the hearing.  Tessa has read up on Max and wants him bad.  The chemistry between these two is off the charts.  When a prison break happens she ends up with Max and he is going to protect her and bring her tons of pleasure.  Can these two work together to get not only through the prison break but through the life they just might want to build?I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book .

5 starI was pulled right into this story. The story has laughs, grief, pain, secrets, and heartbreak.If you have not read the below I would recommend reading those books(s) firstRyan's Love (Sawyer Brothers #1)This is Bailey and Jackson’s story. When Jackson loses one of the most important people in his life he shatters.  Bailey can feel his pain as she lost one of the most important people she loved years ago.  She knows how he feels.  As they battle their grief they come together. Bailey and Jackson are healing each other and in love.  They are so good together but Bailey is battling some issues with her mother and father.  When her mother needs her she knows she has to go to her.  Jackson is home trying to fend off an old flame.  When Jackson tells Bailey a lie will it be the end of everything?  Or will Jackson be able to explain?  Will he be able to get Bailey back or is she done with him forever?I loved these characters and also the side characters. I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book and can’t wait for the next story from this author.

4 starI was pulled right into this story. The story has laughs, grief, pain, secrets, abuse, and heartbreak.This is Cara and Hawk’s story. Cara meets Hawk in a bar one night he is hot and a dirty talker but she knows he is not for her so she rejects him.  Hawk wants Cara and will do anything he can to get her.  They keep coming together but afterward get mad and reject each other.  When Cara needs protection Hawk steps up and takes her in.  He will protect her with his life but while he has her close he will make her his.  Cara knows she has feeling for Hawk but she is afraid he is just using her.  Can he prove he wants to claim her?  When Cara leaves and goes to a meeting she gets herself in trouble.  Will he get the chance to claim her or will she push him away? Can Hawk realize she is in trouble and help her before anything happens to her?  Or will she be too far gone?I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book and can’t wait for the next story from this author.

5 starI was pulled right into this story. The story flowed well and I was kept interested. The story has laughs, pain, abuse, love, betrayal, kidnapping, grief, healing, and heartbreak.If you have not read the below I would recommend reading those books(s) firstMica (Rebel Wayfarers MC, #1)Slate (Rebel Wayfarers MC, #2)Bear (Rebel Wayfarers MC, #3)Jase (Rebel Wayfarers MC, #4)Gunny (Rebel Wayfarers MC #5)Mason (Rebel Wayfarers MC, #6)This is Hope and Hoss’s story. Hope has been taking care of herself and her son for the last 8 years. When she is let go from her job again she decides to pack up her son and go find her sister.  She meets Hoss the same night she connects with her sister.  Hoss wants Hope but he needs to protect her.  So he will keep her safe from a distance.  When she is fired from each of her jobs that the MC sets her up with she decides to seek a job outside of the MC.  Hoss is called in to get her after a fight in a bar she is working.  Hoss decides to stake a claim but what he does not realize is that Hope is different than all the other woman he has ever dealt with.  She has always had to take care of herself and her son and she will always put her son first.  When he runs hot and cold with her she thinks he is done with her.  She moves out of the place she can’t afford and into a place she can.  When an attack happens on the club Hope is spooked.  Can Hoss get her to understand he and the MC Brothers would protect her and her son with their lives?  What happens when they finally come together only to lose the best part of them in the end?  Can the family still go on?  Or will the pain bring them to their knees?I loved both of these characters. Hoss is strong and so very sweet and gentle with Hope and her son when they both need it. Hope is strong and will protect the ones she loves with her life.  As always you get a ton of the side characters. I have to say the ending of this story gutted me.  I was not expecting where the author was going and was completely crushed with her final path.  Although it was written with beauty and grace I was completely shocked. Bring your tissues as you will need them for this one.  I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book and can’t wait for the next story in this series.

5 starThis is Levee and Sam’s story. Levee is looking for a way out of life.  She is on a bridge late one night and wonders if this is the end.  Sam is on that same bridge.  He is drawn to broken girls and Levee is broken.  Can he talk her down and keep her safe?  As they both struggle with their own battles and pasts can they heal each other?  Are they even good for each other?  With each bridge filled night they become closer but will secrets be the one thing that tears them apart?  Can they really build a relationship when they are both hiding behind the secrets?I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book.

5 starI was pulled right into this story. The story has laughs, betrayal, suspense, secrets, lies, twists & turns, and heartbreak.  This story ends on a cliffy but not a relationship one.This is Calla and Cain’s story. Calla and Cain were married when she was 18 but just hours into the marriage she is betrayed.  She leaves town.  Now years later she wants to move on with her live and needs Cain to sign the divorce papers.  What she does not expect is he will not sign and needs her to stay with him.  Can she handle staying with him without getting her heart shattered again?  Cain needs to tell her the truth that he never told her years ago when he let her go.  Can he really give her the entire truth?  What happens when the secrets and lies finally come to light?  Will they still have a love to fight for or will even that be destroyed?I loved these characters and also the side characters. I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book.

4 starI was pulled right into this story. This book will pull you in and keep you reading to get all your questions answers.If you have not read the below I would recommend reading those books(s) firstUncensored Passion (Men of Passion #1)This is Mckay and Harm’s story. Mckay gets hired by Harm to find a woman and her teenage son.  Mckay wonders if Harm wants the woman for good intentions or bad ones.  Can Harm prove that he is a good guy?  Or will McKay always assume the worst?  Can they find the woman Harm wants to find?  Will they be the protectors or the destroyers of that woman?  Can McKay and Harm trust each other? Will the attraction bring these two closer together or will Harm push him away after the hurt she has endured in her previous relationships? While reading you might be able to guess what is going to happen you might just be right but the author does throw in a few twists & turns that are unexpected.I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I recommend this book.

4.7 Star ReviewI would recommend reading the other books listed below in this series so you better understand the people in this storyWhen We Touch (Whiskey Creek, #0.5) – Olivia & BrandonWhen Lightning Strikes (Whiskey Creek, #1) - Gail & SimonWhen Snow Falls (Whiskey Creek, #2) – Cheyenne & DylanWhen Summer Comes (Whiskey Creek, #3) – Callie & LeviHome to Whiskey Creek (Whiskey Creek, #4) – Adelaide & NoahTake Me Home for Christmas (Whiskey Creek, #5) – Sophia & TedCome Home to Me (Whiskey Creek, #6) – Presley & AaronThe Heart Of Christmas (Whiskey Creek, #7) – Eve & Rex (Brent)This Heart of Mine (Whiskey Creek #8) – Phoenix & RileyLourdes is in Whiskey Creek to write her next set of songs.  But when a heater has he temporally staying with Kyle until her can get is fixed.  She has been dating her manager for a few years but the relationship has been not great for a while.  She is attracted to Kyle but knows she can’t act on it.  When she suspects her boyfriend of cheating what will she do?  Will he admit to it?  Will that make her want Kyle even more? When she knows she has to go back home will she realizes she wants Kyle more then she wanted her ex?  Or will she leave anyway as she will never stay in a small town?Kyle believes he will be never get over his love for Olivia but when he meets Lourdes he wonders if that is true.  She is taken so they will remain friends.  They get to know each other by being roommates until he can get the heater fixed.  Kyle is still dealing with his ex-wife who is crazy and will do almost anything to get him back.  When he starts to fall for Lourdes he knows as he is falling it is a mistake.  She is taken and she will never stay in Whiskey Creek her life is in Nashville. When she leaves will he tell her how he feels even if she can’t stay?  What about his ex-wife?  Will his ex-wife ruin everything?I highly recommend this series and this author.

4.5 starThe story has laughs, abuse, kidnapping, betrayal, suspense, and heartbreak.If you have not read the below I would recommend reading those books(s) firstThe Darkest Hour (KGI, #1)No Place to Run (KGI #2)Hidden Away (KGI #3)Whispers in the Dark (KGI #4)Echoes at Dawn (KGI #5)Softly at Sunrise (KGI #5.5)Shades of Gray (KGI #6)Forged in Steele (KGI #7)After the Storm (KGI #8)When Day Breaks (KGI #9)This is Honor and Swanson’s story. Honor is on the run from a group that wants her dead.  When Hancock rescues her she thinks she is going home. But he needs her in order to take down some people.  He and his team feel a duty to take down this guy that they have been trying to get for years and this is a perfect opportunity to do it. Sacrifice one to save many.  But Honor is tearing down walls with not only him but his men at every turn.  When she saves a teammates life and takes a bullet they all question the mission.  Can they still do the mission when it means that Honor will suffer so much pain and abuse before her death?  The mission would have worked had she been a faceless person but she is not.  When she is finally told of her fate she is so betrayed.  She understands and forgives the team and that is the final straw.  Hancock just can’t do it.  Can he find another way without her getting hurt?  They are in love but what about the mission?  When they comes up with a plan for the mission and set out to take down the first man things go horribly wrong.  Men are injured and Honor is taken.  Now Hancock and his man need the help of the KGI.  Can the KGI help Hancock get Honor back or is it too late for her?  If they get her back will she ever be the same?I loved these characters and also the side characters. I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book and can’t wait for the next story in this series.

4.5 starI was pulled right into this story. The story has pain, laughs, suspense, and heartbreak.This is Grace and Merrick’s story. Merrick lost not only his brothers in arms but also part of himself with the war.  He is badly injured on his left side and has also lost his vision.  He goes back home and just wants to be left alone.  His mother who tries to help him out decides he needs a nurse.  The Nurse he hires is Grace.  Grace lives next door to Merrick.  She makes Merrick feel by getting him to do things and getting to know him.  Grace has her own pain and when Merrick over hears what she has gone through he can almost feel the pain she feels.  Grace and Merrick grew up around each other but were not friends so he can’t remember what she looks like.  Is there a way she can come out of his grumpiness and make Grace believe that he is a good man?  Is there a way they can heal each other enough that they can move on together?I loved these characters and also the side characters. I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book.

4.5 starThe story has secrets, twist & turns and edge of your seat suspense.This story will have you getting to know Nikolai and Maya.  Maya is going to be Nikolai’s intern for about 1 year.  Nikolai is a special doctor that can help you erase your memories by using pain and pleasure.  He is bossy, controlling, and twisted.  There are a ton of secrets in this story but you will only ever figure out the full story by reading the entire book.  The clues are throughout the story.  What happens when why taking memories away old ones you thought were gone come sneaking back in?  What happens when feelings become involved?  As they pull back the layers will it make it better or worse for Maya?  Is she safe?  Is the doctor the enemy?  What does he want from her in the end?  Will she be a shell of a woman in the end or be the one in control?I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book.

5 starI was pulled right into this story. The story flowed very well. The story has laughs, pain, abuse, murder, secrets, suspense, and heartbreak.If you have not already I would recommend reading the below books in this series first:Incandescent (Knights Rebels MC, #1)Affliction (Knights Rebels MC, #2)Reclaimed (Knights Rebels MC, #2.5)Desertion (Knights Rebels MC #3)This is Mackenzie and Beau’s story. The last time he protected her there was trouble.  Does the club want to bring her in and protect her if she might bring trouble again?  Beau is a born protector and he wanted Mackenzie from the first time her saw her.  Can he fight his feelings and keep her at a distance so he can keep a clear head?  When it looks like she might leave the club he talks her into staying with him.  Can he keep his hands to himself when she in his space day and night? What happens when her past comes for her?  Secrets will be revealed and people will get hurt.  In the end will the MC and the brothers ever be the same?I loved these characters and also the side characters. I felt I was able to connect with the characters and the story was a great read.I highly recommend this book and this series.

4 starThe story has laughs, secrets, and heartbreak.This is Abigail and Logan’s story. After a near death experience Logan and his friends make a pact to see if they already had the “one”.  Logan’s one was Abigail.  So now 11 years after a one-night stand Logan is going to knock on Abigail’s door and see if she is the one that got away.  The chemistry between these two is off the charts.  Logan is determined to get Abigail back into his bed and will do anything to get her there.  What he does not know is Abigail is keeping a secret that could destroy the trust they have.  Can Logan ever forgive her for what she is hiding?  Can they make a relationship work?I recommend this book.

5 starThe story has laughs, secrets, and heartbreak.This is Lovey and Marc’s story. Lovey just quit her job and dumped her boyfriend.  She is going to stay with her brother.  What he didn’t count on was that his roommate Marc who is smoking hot.  Marc is drawn to Lovey right from the start but his friend, her brother warns him off.  So Marc is going to stay away.  The longer Lovey stays with her brother and Marc the closer she wants to be to Marc.  Once they come together they know it has to be a secret or Duncan will kill Marc.
